text: The 2006–07 Liga IV was the 65th season of the Liga IV, the fourth tier of the Romanian football league system. The champions of each county association play against one from a neighboring county in a play-off match played on a neutral venue. The winners of the play-off matches promoted to Divizia C. ==2006–2007 Promotion Play-Off== The matches was scheduled to be played on 16 June 2007. |colspan=3 style="background-color:#97DEFF;"|16 June 2007 |} == See also == * 2006–07 Liga I * 2006–07 Liga II * 2006–07 Liga III ==References== ==External links== * FRF Category:Liga IV seasons 4 Romania
title: 2006–07 Liga IV
